verses.verse: For all this I laid <S%H5414><s%> to my heart, <S%H3820><s%> even to explore <S%H952><s%> all this: <S%H6662><s%> that the righteous, and the wise, <S%H2450><s%> and their works, <S%H5652><s%> are in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> whether it is love <S%H160><s%> or <S%H1571><s%> hatred, <S%H8135><s%> man <S%H120><s%> doesn't <S%H3045><s%> know it; <S%H6440><s%> all is before them.

All things come alike to all. <S%H259><s%> There is one event <S%H4745><s%> to the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and to the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> to the good, <S%H2896><s%> to the clean, <S%H2889><s%> to the unclean, <S%H2931><s%> to him who sacrifices, <S%H2076><s%> and to him who doesn't <S%H834><s%> sacrifice. <S%H2076><s%> As is the good, <S%H2896><s%> so is the sinner; <S%H2398><s%> he who takes <S%H7650><s%> an oath, <S%H3373><s%> as he who fears an oath. <S%H7621><s%>

This is an evil <S%H7451><s%> in all that is done <S%H6213><s%> under the sun, <S%H8121><s%> that there is one <S%H259><s%> event <S%H4745><s%> to all: <S%H3820><s%> yes also, the heart of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of evil, <S%H7451><s%> and madness <S%H1947><s%> is in their heart <S%H3824><s%> while they live, <S%H2416><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that they go to the dead. <S%H4191><s%>

For <S%H4310><s%> to him who is <S%H3426><s%> joined <S%H2266><s%> with all the living <S%H2416><s%> there is hope; <S%H986><s%> for a living <S%H2416><s%> dog <S%H3611><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than a dead <S%H4191><s%> lion. <S%H738><s%>

For the living <S%H2416><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> that they will die, <S%H4191><s%> but the dead <S%H4191><s%> don't <S%H3045><s%> know anything, <S%H3972><s%> neither do they have any more a reward; <S%H7939><s%> for their memory <S%H2143><s%> is forgotten. <S%H7911><s%>

Also their love, <S%H160><s%> their hatred, <S%H8135><s%> and their envy <S%H7068><s%> has perished <S%H6><s%> long ago; <S%H3528><s%> neither have they any more a portion <S%H2506><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> in anything that is done <S%H6213><s%> under the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

Go your way <S%H3212><s%> â€” eat <S%H398><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> with joy, <S%H8057><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> your wine <S%H3196><s%> with a merry <S%H2896><s%> heart; <S%H3820><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> has already <S%H3528><s%> accepted <S%H7521><s%> your works. <S%H4639><s%>
Let your garments <S%H899><s%> be always <S%H6256><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> and don't <S%H7218><s%> let your head lack <S%H2637><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>

Live <S%H2416><s%> joyfully <S%H7200><s%> with the wife <S%H802><s%> whom you love <S%H157><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life <S%H2416><s%> of vanity, <S%H1892><s%> which he has given <S%H5414><s%> you under the sun, <S%H8121><s%> all your days <S%H3117><s%> of vanity: <S%H1892><s%> for that is your portion <S%H2506><s%> in life, <S%H2416><s%> and in your labor <S%H5999><s%> in which you labor <S%H6001><s%> under the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

Whatever your hand <S%H3027><s%> finds <S%H4672><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> it with your might; <S%H3581><s%> for there is no work, <S%H4639><s%> nor device, <S%H2808><s%> nor knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> nor wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> in Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> where you are going. <S%H1980><s%>

I returned, <S%H7725><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> under the sun, <S%H8121><s%> that the race <S%H4793><s%> is not to the swift, <S%H7031><s%> nor the battle <S%H4421><s%> to the strong, <S%H1368><s%> neither yet bread <S%H3899><s%> to the wise, <S%H2450><s%> nor yet riches <S%H6239><s%> to men of understanding, <S%H995><s%> nor yet favor <S%H2580><s%> to men of skill; <S%H3045><s%> but time <S%H6256><s%> and chance <S%H6294><s%> happen to them all. <S%H7136><s%>

For man <S%H120><s%> also doesn't <S%H3045><s%> know his time. <S%H6256><s%> As the fish <S%H1709><s%> that are taken <S%H270><s%> in an evil <S%H7451><s%> net, <S%H4685><s%> and as the birds <S%H6833><s%> that are caught <S%H270><s%> in the snare, <S%H6341><s%> even so <S%H1992><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> snared <S%H3369><s%> in an evil <S%H7451><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%> when it falls <S%H5307><s%> suddenly on them. <S%H6597><s%>
I have also seen <S%H7200><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> under the sun <S%H8121><s%> in this <S%H2090><s%> way, <S%H1419><s%> and it seemed great to me.

There was a little <S%H6996><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and few <S%H4592><s%> men <S%H582><s%> within it; <S%H1419><s%> and a great king <S%H4428><s%> came <S%H935><s%> against it, <S%H5437><s%> besieged it, <S%H1129><s%> and built great <S%H1419><s%> bulwarks against it. <S%H4685><s%>

Now a poor <S%H4542><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H376><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> in it, <S%H2450><s%> and he by his wisdom delivered <S%H4422><s%> the city; <S%H5892><s%> yet no man <S%H120><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> that same poor <S%H4542><s%> man. <S%H120><s%>

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than strength. <S%H1369><s%>" Nevertheless the poor man <S%H4542><s%>'s wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is despised, <S%H959><s%> and his words <S%H1697><s%> are not heard. <S%H8085><s%>
The words <S%H1697><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> in quiet <S%H5183><s%> are better than the cry <S%H2201><s%> of him who rules <S%H4910><s%> among fools. <S%H3684><s%>
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war; <S%H7128><s%> but one <S%H259><s%> sinner <S%H2398><s%> destroys <S%H6><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>
